summary: The National Institute of Standards and Technology helps promote U.S. innovation and industrial competitiveness by providing measurement services and supporting the development of standards in collaboration with the private sector. For example, it provides calibrations for equipment used in high-precision manufacturing and it helps industry develop standards for fire safety, among other things. We found NIST has taken steps to address challenges it faces in...
title: National Institute of Standards and Technology: Additional Review and Coordination Could Help Meet Measurement Service Needs and Strengthen Standards Activities
